name: Sparks of Divinity
description:
Happy New Year 2020!

And what better way to celebrate than having a nice little firework?

To control the red rocket, use "A"
To control the blue rocket, use "S"
To control the green rocket, use "D"
After pressing the button the rocket will switch directions, from right to left and vice versa.

Try to avoid the obstacles, the higher you get the more points you obtain!
